alert.note: Alert for Northern Warren; Northern Washington (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 6:31PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Warren and northern Washington Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 631 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Chestertown, or 11 miles north of Warrensburg, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and brief heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Warrensburg, Whitehall, Hague, Eagle Point Campground, Scaroon Manor Public Campground, Chestertown, Bolton Landing, Huletts Landing, Putnam, Mount Hope, Bolton, Hampton, Shelving Rock, South Bay, Starbuckville, Putnam Station, South Bay Village, Pottersville, Snody Dock and Sabbath Day Point. This includes Interstate 87 between exits 23 and 26. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
